title: Skull and Olive Branch
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
description: Stylized skull in black and white, clenching in its teeth a green branch with berries (olive branch), on dark blue background.  This anti-Vietnam war poster is a grim "remake" emphasizing the image of death, rather than a more traditional peace image of a dove with an olive branch in its beak.  The bold colors and the illusion of collage(through which the olive branch is "segmented" by the teeth of the skull) convey a deceptively simplistic, but powerful, propagandistic message .
name: Poster
